casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Naugler, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Naugler, 111 Ohio St.3d 130, 2QQ6-Ohio-5340.]

(No. 2006-0019 Submitted September 20, 2006 Decided November 1, 2006.) Appeal from the Court of Appeals for Madison County, No. CA2004-09-033, 2005-Ohio-6274. *131Browning & Cooke, Andrew P. Cooke, and Adam J. Bennett, for appellant.

*130{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of the decision of the Supreme Court of the United States in Davis v. Washington (2006),-U.S.-, 126 S.Ct. 2266, 165 L.Ed.2d 224.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur.
